properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for IP Mgmt * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2012 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

field.filter: SELECT Person AS p WHERE p.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Organization AS parent JOIN Organization AS child ON child.parent_id = parent.id WHERE child.id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Block AS b WHERE (b.org_id = :this->org_id AND :this->parent_org_id = 0) OR (b.org_id = :this->parent_org_id)
SELECT IPv4Block AS b WHERE b.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPRangeUsage AS r WHERE r.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Subnet AS s WHERE s.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Domain AS d WHERE d.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPUsage AS i WHERE i.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Subnet AS s WHERE s.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPv4Range AS r WHERE r.subnet_id = :this->subnet_id AND r.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Person AS p WHERE p.org_id = :this->org_id

profile.name: Hostmaster
profile.description: Person handling the IP space and looking after the IP changes
